posts.post_title: 11 T207s for sale or trade mostly tough backs
posts.post_content:
Posted By: David G
I have not put prices yet as my first preference is to trade for T207s, 1915 CJs, Obaks or T202s that I need.  If you wish to purchase for now, just make me an offer - if within the range of recent selling prices I am likely to accept.  Follow the link for scans of most of the cards 
Cycle back - Hyatt
Anon back - Kutina, Spratt
Broadleaf - Cunningham, Moriarty, Miller, Phelan, Hartley (SGC A, Carter Collection)
Recruit - Vaughn, Mitchell (Cle), Marquard (PSA 4 MC)

The T206s and Playballs in the other scans are also available if interested.

Thanks for looking
David G


[url]http://s209.photobucket.com/albums/bb222/Sixtofan/T206%20duplicates/Dupes%20for%20Sale%20or%20Trade[/url]/
